description: Applies a machine learning model to a data cube of input features and predicts the probabilities of the output classes.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data cube containing the input features.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: A ML model that was trained with one of the ML training processes such as ``ml_fit_regr_random_forest()``.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: The name of the dimension that the model applies to. Fails with a `DimensionNotAvailable` exception if the specified dimension does not exist.

returns.description: A data cube with the predicted (class) probabilities. It removes the specified dimension and adds a dimension for the class probabilities. It has the name `probabilities` and is of type `other`.
